Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii


Megastorm:

     After witnessing the merger between Megatron and Galvatron, Megastorm went and hid himself away. He then contacted the Tripredacus Council, after filling them in he expected a reward. He didn't get it.

     "So, you failed to destroy Megatron when you had the chance, and you allowed him to merge with a more powerful robot?" One of the council members said. "You have failed us, Megastorm." With that Megastorm could feel something burning in his chest, what he felt was the lasers installed around his Spark. The Tripredacus Council built him, and they would not have their creations running amok without control over them. They had even taken the precautions to mute him while this was going on. Megastorm died quietly, because he could not scream.

(OOC: If anybody wants his body, it's about 100 yards from the Tripred base, have fun with it. He's advanced!)



---------------------------------

The Tripredacus Council built him, and they would not have their creations running amok without control over them. They had even taken the precautions to mute him while this was going on.
